videos.headline: Fromm connects with Hardman for first TD of the game
videos.description: Jake Fromm finds Mecole Hardman for a 5-yard touchdown to put the Bulldogs up 7-0.

videos.headline: Chubb bounces to the outside for big TD run
videos.description: Nick Chubb makes a defender miss on his way to a 32-yard touchdown run.

videos.headline: UGA's Fromm threads the needle, finds  Godwin for long TD pass
videos.description: Jake Fromm finds Terry Godwin for 51-yard touchdown pass to give Georgia a 21-0 lead.

videos.headline: Samford gets on the board with TD catch
videos.description: TaDarryl Marshall out-leaps Georgia defender for a nine-yard touchdown catch to cut Bulldogs' lead to 21-7.

videos.headline: Samford's defense forces turnover
videos.description: Deion Pierre's big hit on Jake Fromm forces the quarterback to fumble, while Samford recovers.

videos.headline: UGA head coach looking for more consistency from QB
videos.description: Kirby Smart wants his quarterback Jake Fromm to make better decisions in the second half.

videos.headline: Nick Chubb runs for his second TD of the game
videos.description: Nick Chubb's 14-yard touchdown run increases Georgia's lead to 28-7.

videos.headline: Fromm throws third TD pass
videos.description: Jake Fromm and Terry Godwin connect again, this time for a 9-yard touchdown pass.

videos.headline: Swift gives Georgia a five-touchdown lead
videos.description: D'Andre Swift escapes defenders with a spin move on his way to an 11-yard touchdown run.

videos.headline: Smart: Win wasn't as clean as it needs to be
videos.description: Kirby Smart said Georgia responded to his halftime plea to force a turnover on defense but the team has to focus on getting better.
